EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Webinar_7AM Spring XD: A Platform for data at scale and developer productiv
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Confirmation: Spring XD: A Platform for data at scale and developer productivity
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, Your registration is confirmed for the webinar Spring XD: A Platform for data at scale and developer productivity with Sabby Anandan, Mark Fisher and Mark Pollack. We are looking forward to having you join us. To help maximize your webinar experience we recommend that you join a test meeting before the session to check your system and browser compatibility at http://www.webex.com/test-meeting.html <http://www.webex.com/test-meeting.html>. Event Details:
Date: Tuesday, February 17, 2015 {{my.My Token:default=Save the Date}} Europe: 3:00pm GMT (London, GMT) Join the WebEx <https://pivotal-io.webex.com/pivotal-io/onstage/g.php?MTID=eb5f1ce4d9b1ab47bf77880c5bed4a850> Dial In: US TOLL FREE+1-855-749-4750 US TOLL+1-415-655-0001 Show toll-free dialing restrictions
Access code: 660 373 430 Thank you,
